PARAGRAPH.STRING: , officially the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), is an East Asian country situated on the northern half of the Korean Peninsula.

northern border is shared predominantly with the People's Republic of China. Russia shares an 18.3-km (11.4-mile) border along the Tumen River in the far northeast corner of the country. To the south,
is bordered by South Korea, with which
formed one territorial unit known as Korea until 1945, when the country was divided into two separate states following World War II.
